What is LegalLingo?: LegalLingo is a website that lets you understand your tax documents in readable terms. This makes it easier and less stressful to do your taxes.
Why not use TurboTax or other methods?: Often, other methods are either really costly, complex, or crowded for you to use. LegalLingo lets you understnad the document for yourself so you don't have to pay anybody.
Why is my document not on here?: If you cannot find your document, it is likely that it is not searched up frequently enough to be added. Please contact us if you would like ot add this document information.
Does it use any of my personal informati: Unlike most tax services, LegalLingo does NOT use any of your personal information in its processing
